pma:database.name: utshab_training_center
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `admission_information` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `applicant_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `course_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `course_duration` int(11) NOT NULL, `reference` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `reference_amount` int(11) NOT NULL, `campus_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `admission_date` date NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `affiliation_fee` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `amount` int(11) NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, `message` varchar(40) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `daily_expense` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `entertainment` int(11) NOT NULL, `advertisement` int(11) NOT NULL, `donation` int(11) NOT NULL, `other` int(11) NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `exam_fees` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `amount` int(11) NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, `message` varchar(40) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `information` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `applicant_name` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `father_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `mother_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `present_village_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `present_post_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `present_thana_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `present_district` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `permanent_village_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `permanent_post_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `permanent_thana_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `permanent_district` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `birth_date` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `image` blob NOT NULL, `nationality` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `religion` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `blood_group` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `class` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `subject` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `institute_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `personal_mob_no1` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `personal_mob_no2` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `personal_mob_no3` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `perent_mob_no1` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `perent_mob_no2` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `perent_mob_no3` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `rel1` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `rel2` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `rel3` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `psc_roll` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `psc_registration` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `psc_gpa` varchar(11) NOT NULL, `psc_passing_year` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `psc_board` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `jsc_roll` varchar(11) NOT NULL, `jsc_registration` varchar(11) NOT NULL, `jsc_gpa` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `jsc_passing_year` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `jsc_board` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `ssc_roll` varchar(11) NOT NULL, `ssc_registration` varchar(11) NOT NULL, `ssc_gpa` varchar(11) NOT NULL, `ssc_passing_year` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `ssc_board` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `hsc_roll` varchar(11) NOT NULL, `hsc_registration` varchar(11) NOT NULL, `hsc_gpa` varchar(11) NOT NULL, `hsc_passing_year` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `hsc_board` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `bsc_institute_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `bsc_gpa` varchar(11) NOT NULL, `bsc_passing_year` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `msc_institute_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `msc_gpa` varchar(11) NOT NULL, `msc_passing_year` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `diploma_institute_name` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `diploma_gpa` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `diploma_passing_year` varchar(30) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `instructor_payments` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `instructor_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `amount` int(11) NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, `message` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `monthly_expense` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `home_rent` int(11) NOT NULL, `electricity_bill` int(11) NOT NULL, `internet_bill` int(11) NOT NULL, `newspaper_bill` int(11) NOT NULL, `donation` int(11) NOT NULL, `other_bill` int(11) NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `other_campus_fee` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `amount` int(11) NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, `message` varchar(40) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `payment_information` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `applicant_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `course_fee` int(11) NOT NULL, `course_paid` int(11) NOT NULL, `course_due` int(11) NOT NULL, `checkbood_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `recipient_name` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `payment_date` date NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `student_board_registration` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `amount` int(11) NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, `message` varchar(40) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `student_other_information` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `applicant_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `activity1` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `activity2` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `activity3` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `opinion1` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `opinion2` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `opinion3` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `date1` date NOT NULL, `date2` date NOT NULL, `date3` date NOT NULL, `org_name1` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `post1` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `district1` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `thana1` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `org_name2` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `post2` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `district2` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `thana2` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `org_name3` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `post3` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `district3` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `thana3` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `org_name4` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `post4` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `district4` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `thana4` varchar(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
